member.name: M:web_api.Controllers.JikanController.GetYourAnime(System.String)
member.summary: Find an anime from jikan api and add it to your list of animes
member.returns: An list of JSON object representing the list of anime

member.name: M:web_api.Controllers.JikanController.GetAnimeList
member.returns: A JSON object representing your list of animes

member.name: M:web_api.Controllers.JikanController.UpdateAnimeList(web_api.Anime)
member.summary: Updates infomation on a specific anime in your list
member.returns: A JSON object representing your list of animes

member.name: M:web_api.Controllers.JikanController.DeleteAnime(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes the specified anime from the list
member.returns: A JSON object representing your list of animes
